comments.body: Looks like our lint rules are disabled for this package. Can you enable the lints in our `tslint.json` and fix up the version string to only be a `MAJOR.MINOR` version (e.g. `0.10`), as opposed to including the patch (e.g. `1.2.3`).

@DanielRosenwasser IMO it's work for another pull request. `matter-js/index.d.ts` has a lot of lint errors (especially jsdoc asterisks alignments lol) :D and there's no fixer (nor prettier support) for them.

https://github.com/hasparus/DefinitelyTyped/pull/1
Sorry for the delay; just as a heads up, this probably doesn't affect the version as you'd expect.
I'll merge this in just not to hold you up too much longer :D
